member.name: M:Telegram.Bot.Extensions.Polling.QueuedUpdateReceiver.YieldUpdatesAsync
member.summary:
Yields s as they are received (or inside ).
Call StartReceiving before using this .
This will continue to yield s as long as is set or there are
Note that this method is NOT thread-safe (but CAN be called multiple times)
